description.message: Extension for Netflix™ to skip intros, recaps, start next movie/episode in faster pace and many more.

disclaimer.message:
NETFLIX is a trademark of Netflix, Inc.. This application and its developer are in no way affiliated with Netflix, Inc..

The software is provided "as is", without a warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.

netflix_changes.message: This feature is disabled due to changes on Netflix™ side that cause problems while using this extension. This may be temporary until workaround is found or permanent when there is no fix found in reasonable time. If there is no fix, this feature might get removed.

versions_rename_localStorage.message: Renaming local storage variable from '{0}' to '{1}'.

no_features_available.message: There are no features available on this page, or there are no valid features enabled.

video_stuck.message: Video seems to be stuck for {0} {1} out of {2}...

page_reload.message: Page reload request was detected within all limits, reloading...

page_reload_delay.message: Reload is being delayed. To prevent account from being blocked, reload will be performed once there is difference at least {0} {1}...

next_video_stop.message: Next video is not from same title and extension is configured to stop playing.

next_video_delay.message: Next video is not from same series, delaying next episode for {0} {1} out of {2}...

lost_focus_pause.message: Video was paused as video player lost focus.

gained_focus_play.message: Video was started as video player gained focus and video was previously paused by extension.

assistant_enabled.message: All extension assistant features were enabled.

assistant_disabled.message: All extension assistant features were disabled.

status_text_ok.message:
Everything seems OK.
Click on status icon to disable all assistant features.

status_text_errors.message: Consider reloading Netflix™, errors were detected.

status_text_update.message: Extension state changed. Either it was updated, reloaded, disabled or uninstalled. Extension should handle this situation on its own, but it is recommended to reload Netflix™ for changes to correctly apply.

status_text_disabled.message:
Extension assistant features are currently disabled.
Click on status icon to enable all assistant features.

status_text_broken.message: Consider reloading Netflix™, extension is not working.

rating_daily_limit.message: Ratings daily limit reached, retry in 24 hours.

ratings_imdb_id_not_found.message: Wikidata did not provide IMDb identification.

ratings_no_data_wikidata.message: No data were provided from Wikidata.

ratings_no_data_omdb_api.message: No data were provided from OMDB API.

help_wikidata.message: Help make WikiData better for everyone. Visit https://www.wikidata.org/w/index.php?search={0}, find correct title in results and add Netflix™ ID: {1}.

changelog_fetch_failed.message: Obtaining changelog failed. Try reloading extension.

cfg_logLevel_description.message: Turns on/off output for specific message types. Option that is chosen will mark output messages of that type that will be shown together with messages of types below, messages of type above will not be shown.

cfg_debug_description.message: Turns on/off debug output for various categories.

cfg_simulateProduction_description.message: Turns on/off debug simulation of production environment.

cfg_simulateProduction_notice.message: This option will force page reload to properly initialise extension. Such reload has a timeout configured in 'Repeated reload delay' debug option to prevent Netflix™ from blocking you for too many queries to their servers.

cfg_showElapsedTime_description.message: Turns on/off display of elapsed video time.

cfg_skipInterrupter_description.message: Turns on/off skipping interruption feature. Interruption happens when other features are disabled and every few episodes Netflix™ will ask you, if you are still watching.

cfg_trailerVideoStop_description.message: Turns on/off stopping of all trailer video previews.

cfg_titleEndAction_description.message: Sets what action should be done when title ends.

cfg_titleEndAction_notice.message: There is one situation when credits will start and Netflix™ will not provide clickable object to roll credits, in this situation extension will start next episode the moment when Netflix™ will try to run trailer video for next title.

cfg_nextEpisodeStopMovies_description.message: Turns on/off automated stopping of next movie, if it is from different title.

cfg_nextEpisodeStopSeries_description.message: Turns on/off automated stopping of next episode, if it is from different title.

cfg_revealSpoilers_description.message: Turns on/off and sets delay for revealing spoilers when mouse hovering over blurred object.

cfg_revealSpoilers_notice.message: Reveal might not work when blurred object is covered by other object (ex. Play button).

cfg_spoilersBlurAmount_description.message: Sets how much should spoiler texts be blurred. The more the texts are blurred the more invisible they seem.

cfg_hideSpoilersObjects_description.message: Turns on/off blurring of spoilers of specific type.

cfg_hideDisliked_description.message: Turns on/off hiding of disliked titles.

cfg_wheelVolume_description.message: Turns on/off and sets how much a mouse wheel scroll changes playback volume.

cfg_autoDisableKids_description.message: Turns on/off automatic disabling of extension features when on Kids profile. It is possible to manually override this by clicking on extension status icon until next page reload or profile change.

cfg_pauseOnBlur_description.message:
Sets sensitivity of automated pausing of the video, in case window or tab is not active.

~ Disabled - Video will not be paused. This also disables 'Play video if focused' feature.
~ Low - Video will be paused if tab is switched or browser is minimized.
~ High - Video will be paused if video player is not in focus (behavior should include actions from Low setting).

cfg_playOnFocus_description.message: Turns on/off automated start of video, if it was paused by 'Pause video if not focused' when video windows is in focus again.

cfg_hideStatusIcon_name.message: Hide status icon in video player

cfg_hideStatusIcon_description.message: Turns on/off hiding of status icon while playing title. If enabled, this would hide extension status icon and pop-up bubble from video player, but will remain available on browse pages to have an ability to disable this setting.

cfg_highlightSubtitles_description.message:
Sets subtitle highlight style.

~ Hide subtitles - All subtitles will be hidden.
~ Disabled - Subtitles will not be highlighted by extension, but might be highlighted by Netflix™.
~ Shadow - Subtitles shadow will be darker and more visible around them, if Netflix™ provides subtitles with black background this will have no effect.
~ Background - Subtitles will receive background that will be 50% transparent, if Netflix™ provides subtitles with black background this will have no effect.

cfg_showRatings_description.message: Turns on/off ratings display and collection. Already collected ratings will stay in local storage but will not be used.

cfg_showRatings_notice_dev.message: Ratings might not work on Development or Test environments.

cfg_ratingsAnchors_description.message: Turns on/off feature to redirect to web of rating source when clicked on ratings.

cfg_ratingsWikidataAnchors_description.message: Turns on/off feature to show links to Wikidata for adding identifications for movies to improve ratings. This will also show Netflix™ title ID in link and in UI to provide relevant data. Some titles will need to be searched manually, in case title name is in language that is not available by Wikidata. If title is completely missing from Wikidata, new title page will have to be created and both IMDb and Netflix™ IDs have to be added. If IMDb ID is missing it has to be searched and added to Wikidata. Data should automatically refresh within one hour.

cfg_ratingsWikidataAnchors_notice.message: This is advised only for advanced users or regular Wikidata contributors.

cfg_ratingsTileSize_description.message: Sets text size of ratings data shown on browse tiles.

cfg_ratingsTilePosition_description.message: Sets position where should ratings data be shown on browse tiles.

cfg_ratingsTileTextAlign_description.message: Sets align of ratings text on browse tiles.

cfg_enableVideoFeatures_description.message: Turns on/off all video features. Netflix™ playback speed will be ignored while this option is enabled. Other extensions with similar video functions might stop working as expected.

cfg_enableVideoFeatures_notice.message: Disabling this feature might require a page refresh to reset video values to default.

cfg_videoSpeedRate_description.message: Sets video speed rate at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoSpeedRate_notice.message: Too sudden changes can de-synchronize audio and video. Page refresh can fix that.

cfg_videoAspectRatio_description.message: Sets video aspect ratio at which will every title play.

cfg_videoZoom_description.message: Sets video zoom at which will every title play. Video aspect ratio must be set to manual for this option to take effect. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoBrightness_description.message: Sets video brightness at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoContrast_description.message: Sets video contrast at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoGrayscale_description.message: Sets video grayscale effect at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoHue_description.message: Sets video hue at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoInvert_description.message: Sets video color invert at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoSaturation_description.message: Sets video saturation at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_videoSepia_description.message: Sets video sepia effect at which will every title play. This can be temporarily overwritten by status bubble controls.

cfg_timeFromLoadLimit_description.message: How many seconds should extension wait, after page is loaded, before considering something might be wrong. For people with slower computers, this might need to be adjusted.

cfg_loadingTimeLimit_description.message: How many seconds should extension wait, while video is loaded, before considering something might be wrong. For people with slower connections, this might need to be adjusted.

cfg_stuckTimeLimit_description.message: How many seconds should extension wait, before reloading web page, after browser and data load time wait timers ran out. This gives some space, in case nothing is wrong, only loading times were longer. Off value disables automated page reload if video does not start playing as expected, default Netflix™ behavior should apply.

cfg_forceReloadDelay_description.message: How many seconds should extension wait before repeated page reloads when extension detects something is wrong. This delay should prevent accidental account locking for 24 hours for too many requests to Netflix™ servers.

cfg_nextTitleDelayLimit_description.message: How many seconds should extension wait, before starting next different title. Off value disables automated start for next videos in case titles are different, default Netflix™ behavior should apply.

cfg_keepHistory_description.message: How many movies/episodes should extension keep history of. Off value disables history of previous videos and also 'Play previous' feature.

cfg_omdbApi_description.message: API key for OMDB API (Free API keys can be generated here: https://omdbapi.com/apikey.aspx).

cfg_exitPlayerKey_description.message: Define key, that will exit Netflix™ video player back to video selection.

cfg_prevEpisodeKey_description.message: Define key, that will return to previous played video, if there is some stored via 'Played history' feature.

cfg_nextEpisodeKey_description.message: Define key, that will skip to next episode, if there is some available.

cfg_randomMovieKey_description.message: Define key, that will start a random movie while on video selection screen.

cfg_toggleAssistantKey_description.message: Define key, that will enable/disable extension assistant features.

cfg_hideSubtitlesKey_description.message: Define key, that will temporarily hide subtitles. Effect lasts until next episode or title.

cfg_bubbleHideDelay_description.message: How long should status bubble stay open after mouse leaves DOM object area. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_titleEndActionsDelay_description.message: How long should extension wait before it starts checking for next title buttons after it started next title.

cfg_controlsSwitchTimer_description.message: How often should mouse move events be switched on video player controls to keep it open while working with extension icon or bubble and options. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_debugControlsSwitchTimer_description.message: How often should DOM elements be removed when debugging simulation of mouse movement events is turned on. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_devToolsRefreshTimer_description.message: How often should data in DevTools be refreshed. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_devToolsConfigLoadTimer_description.message: How often should configuration in DevTools be refreshed. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_elementHandlerTimer_description.message: How often should extension icon be updated. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_environmentUpdateTimer_description.message: How often should environment variables and events be updated. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_errorExtensionReloadDelay_descriptio.message: How long should extension reload be delayed after too many core errors have occurred. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_injectorTimer_description.message: How often should event injection occur. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_pageReloadTimer_description.message: How often should timer check if page reload is requested. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_keyEventProcessingDelay_description.message: How often should extension check for pressed key binds. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_netflixAssistantTimer_description.message: How often should Netflix™ assistant actions to be performed. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_netflixRatingsTimer_description.message: How often should Netflix™ ratings to be checked and inserted. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_playPauseButtonDelay_description.message: How long should play/pause button click be delayed after intro or recap was skipped to prevent video from staying playing/paused after the activity. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_skippingPreventionTimer_description.message: How long should be the delay before extension starts to skip intros/recaps after skipping intro/recap before. Changing this value may require extension reload.

cfg_startupTimer_description.message: How often should check for possible startup occur. Changing this value may require extension reload.

button_reset_debug.message: Reset all debug options to default

button_reset_bindings.message: Reset all key binding options to default

button_reset_video.message: Reset all video options to default

confirm_reset.message: Are you sure you want to reset all values to default?

ratingsTileTextAlign_type_same_as_positi.message: Same as horizontal position of tile ratings

debug_message_without_access.message: Debug message did not provide any access information. Original message was '{0}'.

debug_variables_noloop.message: Unable to loop trough object (last known key: '{0}').

debug_warning_notice.message: Changing any of following values may lead to poor performance or unexpected behavior and ultimately may break extension.

error_core_assistant_delay.message: CORE ERROR DETECTED: Assistant call is too old, restarting assistant loop ({0} - {1} = {2} > {3}).

error_invalid_value.message: Stored configuration value for variable {0} is not valid, default value was used instead.

error_loading_value.message: Error loading stored configuration value for variable {0}, default value was used instead. Error: {1}

error_range_config.message: Range configuration of variable '{0}' is missing some of the following values: min, max, step.

error_gen_tab_content.message: Error generating options tab contents. Error: {0}

wrong_configuration_type.message: Provided configuration item '{0}' is of wrong type '{1}', expected type is '{2}'.

show_debug_variables_hint.message: Show debug variables as JSON (default) or HTML.

error_reload.message: Extension detected too many critical errors. It will self reload within few seconds.

devtools_tabs_error.message: Netflix™ Extended DevTools work only with Netflix™ tab.

stat_storage_size_unknown.message: Unable to determine size at this moment.

stat_ratings_api_limit.message: API key limit reached for today

stat_playOnFocus.message: Played on focus after pause on blur

stat_wikidata_imdb_not_available.message: Wikidata calls with no IMDb ID

stat_wikidata_not_available.message: Wikidata calls with no Netflix™ ID

stat_api_limit.message: OMDB API calls with API limit reached

stat_api_invalid.message: OMDB API calls with invalid key
